channel.title: University of Missouri (R-103)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: "Univ of Missouri Research Reactor,MURR."
item.description: GENERAL EXTERNAL TECHNICAL REPORTS, TEXT-SAFETY REPORT
item.author: MISSOURI, UNIV. OF, COLUMBIA, MO

item.title: Responds to NRC 790730 ltr requesting SNM inventory justification.Justification of 45-kg allotment & info re inventories for proposed fuel design change encl.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: MISSOURI, UNIV. OF, COLUMBIA, MO

item.title: Responds to 831007 ltr transmitting G Pollack rept re conversion from high to low enriched U fuel at univ research reactors.Financial problem w/conversion addressed in rept. Increased federal funding needed for univ-based reactors.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: MISSOURI, UNIV. OF, COLUMBIA, MO

item.title: Ack receipt of ltr re conversion from high to low enriched U fuel at univ research reactors.Ltr will be forwarded to vice president for response.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: MISSOURI, UNIV. OF, COLUMBIA, MO

item.title: Responds to 831007 ltr transmitting G Pollack rept re conversion from high to low enriched U fuel at univ research reactors.Misperceptions in Pollack rept addressed in encl rept, "Univ of Missouri Research Reactor."
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: MISSOURI, UNIV. OF, COLUMBIA, MO

item.title: Advises that reactor produced byproduct matls can be stored at site under byproduct license,per 821206 telcon.No action will be taken as result of Item 3 of 820915 notice of violation.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: MISSOURI, UNIV. OF, COLUMBIA, MO

item.title: Provides commitment that administrative procedures dealing w/transfer of low level waste from reactor license to byproduct license will be established & records of transfers will be maintained by 830430.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: MISSOURI, UNIV. OF, COLUMBIA, MO
